text: I think less is more when it comes to kissing in the movies.
author: Julia Roberts

text: I'm doing 'Les Miserables,' the movie. I've done a lot of musicals and a lot of movies, and I know there are not a lot of people in Hollywood who have been down those two paths so I've been like, 'Come on, let's do a movie/musical.'
author: Hugh Jackman

text: I have done many movies that people hadn't seen. 'The Fountain,' I spent a year on that. 'The Prestige' with Chris Nolan, and 'Australia.' From my perspective it's very satisfying. Some movies people see and other movies they don't. 'Wolverine,' 'X Men,' I know that in some level people know me just for that and it's fine for me.
author: Hugh Jackman

text: Nobody makes movies like Oliver Stone.
author: Shia LaBeouf
